petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: C R put up today. IO of the case has submitted the charge sheet along with rough sketch of PO, seizure list, medical examination report and photocopy of statement of victim u/s 164 Cr.P.C. and the case diary.Registered the case as Special Case.

Accused Monowar Hussain is produced from Jail hajot. Remanded till 14-06-2018.Issue notice to the Complainant and hear on discharging the accused persons Eusuf Ali and Monowara Bibi.Copy ready and forwarded to the accused.
Charge framed

Accused Monowar Hussain is produced from jail hajot. Remanded till 12-07-18. Victim Mariom Nessa is present.  Seen the petition 989/18 filed by counsel Mr. Abu Hai Siddiqul Islam. By filing petition 989/18 counsel Mr. Abu Hai Siddiqul Islam prays time to cross examine the witness. This is a case u/s 4 of the POCSO Act and victim appeared to adduce her evidence. As victim of POCSO case is appeared and one of the engaged counsel is also present, prayer for another date to cross examine is rejected. The witness is examined but the counsel present before the court declined to cross examined the victim. As counsel appeared before the court declined to cross examined the witness, cross examination is dispensed u/s 309(2)(c) Cr.P.C.Issue summon o rest of the PWs.Fixing 12-07-18 for production, 26-07-18 for further evidence.
Accused Monowar Hussain is produced from Jail hajot. Remanded back to Jail hajot till 26-07-2018.

Accused Monowar Hussain produced from jail hajot. Remanded till 30.07.18 for production. 4 PWs are present but counsel appointed by the accused not appeared before the court to conduct the case. As accused is in jail that case is adjourned. Witnesses Noimuddin, Khater Ali, Monowara Khatun and Abdul Kader allowed to go on P. R bond  of Rs.50/ with direction to be present on next fixed date.Fixing 30-07-18 for production of accused /Pw

Accused Monowar Hussain is produced from jail hajot. remanded till 04-08-2018 as per order dated 17-07-2018 head master of the 856 no Hatipota LP school is appearedHe is examined and after cross discharged fixing 04-08-2018 for order on petition no 1130/18 in view of this as prayed by Ld. defence counsel examination of witnesses Noimuddin and Abdul Kader is adjournedfix 04-08-2018 for production and order on petition no 1130/18.

Accused Monowar Hussain produced from jail hajot. Remanded till 18-08-2018Accused Monowar Hussain not held juvenile in conflict with law.Bail petition Vide no. 1130/18 is not allowed. Issue summon to PWsFixing 18-08-2018 for production of accused and 01-09-18 for PW.

Accused Monowar Hussain produced from jail hajot. Remanded till 01-09-2018. Four witnesses Noimuddin, Monowara Khatun, Khater Ali Sk. and Abdul Kader are present. perused the record. it is seen from the record that accused engaged Mr. Nur Mahammad Sarkar as engaged counsel of the accused. It is further seen from the record that hen case is fixed for evidence, the counsel engaged by the accused Monowar namely Mr. Nur Mahammad Sarkar advocate remain absent and did not take any steps.Ld. Addl. P.P. prays for the cost of Rs. 500/- each to four witnesses citing that all the witnesses came earlier and today is the third time witnesses are coming to the court but due to absence of engaged counsel of the accused they could not be examined.Considering the submission made so by Ld. Addl. P.P. case is adjourned with cost of Rs. 500/- each with direction to the witnesses Noimuddin, Monowara Khatun, Khater Ali Sk. and Abdul Kader to appear on next date fixed without fail and allowed to go on PR bond. If engaged counsel will found absent on next date the witnesses will be examined as per Code of Criminal Procedure.

Accused Monowar Hussain produced from Jail hajot remanded till 15-09-2018, 4 witnesses present.By filing petition 1425/18, Ld. counsel for accused prays to stay the proceeding till disposal of Criminal Revision vide No. 294/18 filed before Hon&#039ble High Court. I have perused the order dated 17-08-2018 passed by Hon&#039ble Hight Court. There is no stay order passed by Hon&#039ble Hight Court.As such as this is a POCSO Act case and 4 PWs present, they are examined and discharged.issue summon to rest PWs.Fix 15-09-2018 for production and 29-09-2018 for further PWs.
Accused Monowar Hussain is produce from jail hajot remanded till 29-09-2018Issue summon to pwsfixing 29-09-2018 for production of accused and PWS

Accused Monowar Husain is present. One PW is present. He is examined and discharged. Perused the petition no. 1612/18 filed by accused prays to cross examine PW-1 and cross is dispense u/s 309(2)(c) Cr.P.C. I have perused the record. In this case at the time of recording statement of the victim on 28-06-2018 one of the engaged counsel of accused present before the court refused to cross examine the witness as such cross by defence  was dispensed u/s 309(2)(c) Cr.P.C. Therefore, this court now cannot entertain the prayer of accused to allow him to cross examine the PW-1 when this court already dispensed the cross examination of PW-1 u/s 309(2)(c) Cr.P.C. By filing another petition 1611/18 accused submitted that Hon&#039ble High Court directed not to dispose of the case and enclosed the copy of order of Hon&#039ble High Court. I have perused the same. Vide order dated 24-09-18 passed in I.A. (Crl.) 704/2008 Hon&#039ble High Court directed to proceed the case till stage of argument till disposal of revision petition 294/18. Accordingly issue summon to PWs.Accused deposited witness cost amount. Pay the amount to the witnesses as per order dated 18-08-2018.Fixing 09-11-2018 for PWs.
Accused is present. PWs absent. Issue fresh summon to rest PWs.Fixing 18-12-2018 for PW.
Accused is present. 1 PW examined and discharged. Issue summon to rest PWs including MO of the case.
C R Putup today as P.O. is on E.L.Accused is present.PWs are absent.Prosecution has to take steps as per order dated 18-12-2018.
Accused is present. 1 PW examined and discharged. Accused is directed to submit recent order of Hon&#039ble High Court.Issue summon to MO and IO at his presence place of posting Karbi Anglong.

Accused Monowar Hussain is present.Seen the petition vide no. 682/19 filed by engaged counsel of the accused.Also seen the order dated 01-04-2019 passed by Hon&#039ble Gauhati Court in connection with Crl. Rev. P. 294/2018. Keep the same with C.R.Accused is directed to submit the final order of Hon&#039ble High Court.Issue summon to PW in view of the earlier order dated 24-09-2018 passed by Hon&#039ble High Court in Cr. Rev. 294/18 to proceed the case till the stage of before argument.Fixing 01-06-2019 for N/O and further PW.
Accused is present. No witness is present.Issue summon to remaining witness.Fixing 02-07-2019 for evidence
Accused is present. No witness is present. Issue fresh summon to M.O and I.O of the case. Fixing 02-08-2019 for evidence of M.O and I.O
Accused is present M.O. and I.O. are not present. Issue fresh summon to M.O. and I.O.
Accused is present. M.O and I.O is not present. Issue fresh summon to the M.O and I.O Fixing 24-09-2019 for M.O and I.O
PW
PW
Accused is present. Witness Pranja Hatibarua is present, he is examined, cross examined and discharged. Issue summon to M.OFixing 17-01-2020 for evidence of M.O
CR Putup today as P.O is on CL
Accused is absent with steps vide Ptn.  No. 143/2020 shown cause of absece. Which is seen and allowed. Issue fresh summon to M.O of the case. Fixing 03-02-2020 for evidence. of Mo
Accused is present. Witness Dr. R Ahmed is present, she is examined, cross examined and discharged. PW is closed. Fixing 13-02-2020 for SD
Accused is present. Due to paucity of time statement u/s 313 crPC could not be recorded. Fixing 24-02-2020 for S/D
CR Put up today as P.O is on C.L
S/D
Accused is present. Fixing 26-03-2020 for S/D
Due to preventive measure to fight against the outbreak of the Novel Corona Virus Covid 19 case is adjourned today.
